Instruction: Add olive oil, balsamic vinegar, salt, and pepper to the bowl; toss to coat the vegetables evenly.

Whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, basil, and garlic in a medium bowl until fully blended. Pour the mixture over the vegetables and toss to coat. Cover the bowl and let it marinate in the refrigerator for at least 1 hour.
Thread the marinated vegetables onto skewers. Grill for 10 to 15 minutes, turning occasionally, until the vegetables are tender and slightly charred.
Remove the vegetables from the grill and serve hot.
